pipes.name: GetStringErrorsPipe

methods.name: transform
methods.rawdescription:
Converts a Validation Error object into an array of strings where each string is a validation error message.
Note: only errors with string values are included, others, i.e. boolean errors are ignored.
methods.description: Converts a Validation Error object into an array of strings where each string is a validation error message. Note: only errors with string values are included, others, i.e. boolean errors are ignored.

Returns a string containing the appropriate bootstrap color

then the pipe will prefix the color string with the prefix string.
color string with the passed in string

jsdoctags.comment: The verb whose color we are trying to get
An optional argument that prefixes the verbs color string with the passed in string

{{ title }}
{{ key.value?.length || 0 }}/{{ keyMaxLength }} {{ value.value?.length || 0 }}/{{ valueMaxLength }} Value Rule {{ ruleType.label }}

components.name: MetadataFormComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-card [formGroup]="form">
  <mat-form-field class="full-width">
    <input
      formControlName="title"
      matInput
      [maxlength]="title_maxlength"
      placeholder="Scenario Name"
      (blur)="touch()"
    />
    <mat-hint>{{ title.value?.length ?? 0 }}/{{ title_maxlength }}</mat-hint>
  </mat-form-field>
  <ng-container *ngIf="title.invalid && title.errors && (title.dirty || title.touched)">
    <mat-error *ngIf="title.errors.required">The scenario name is required.</mat-error>
    <mat-error *ngIf="title.errors.maxlength"> Cannot be more than {{ title_maxlength }} characters long. </mat-error>
    <mat-error *ngFor="let error of title.errors | getStringErrors">{{ error }}</mat-error>
  </ng-container>

  <mat-form-field class="full-width top-margin">
    <input
      formControlName="description"
      matInput
      [maxlength]="description_maxlength"
      placeholder="Description"
      (blur)="touch()"
    />
    <mat-hint>{{ description.value?.length ?? 0 }}/{{ description_maxlength }}</mat-hint>
  </mat-form-field>
  <ng-container *ngIf="description.invalid && description.errors && (description.dirty || description.touched)">
    <mat-error *ngIf="description.errors.maxlength">
      Cannot be more than {{ description_maxlength }} characters long.
    </mat-error>
  </ng-container>
</mat-card>

getSignature.name: selectAllChecked
getSignature.rawdescription:
Returns true if the selection check box should be marked as checked, false otherwise
This is determined by checking to see if any of the options are selected. If any
of the options are selected then the checkbox should be selected because it's
functionality is now to deselect the selected options.
getSignature.description: Returns true if the selection check box should be marked as checked, false otherwise This is determined by checking to see if any of the options are selected. If any of the options are selected then the checkbox should be selected because it's functionality is now to deselect the selected options.

components.name: TextInputComponent

methodsClass.name: setDirty
methodsClass.rawdescription:
Sets the text input to dirty when it becomes out of focus. Required
to show the error messages since the state matcher checks if the input is dirty
methodsClass.description: Sets the text input to dirty when it becomes out of focus. Required to show the error messages since the state matcher checks if the input is dirty

components.templateData:
<mat-form-field *ngIf="!multiLine">
  <input
    matInput
    [placeholder]="title"
    [formControl]="control"
    (focusout)="setDirty()"
    [errorStateMatcher]="errorStateMatcher"
    autocomplete="off"
    [maxlength]="maxLength"
  />
  <mat-error *ngFor="let error of getErrors()">
    {{ error }}
  </mat-error>
  <mat-hint *ngIf="maxLength" align="end">{{ control.value?.length }}/{{ maxLength }}</mat-hint>
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field *ngIf="multiLine">
  <textarea
    matInput
    cdkTextareaAutosize
    cdkAutosizeMinRows="8"
    [placeholder]="title"
    [formControl]="control"
    [errorStateMatcher]="errorStateMatcher"
    autocomplete="off"
    (focusout)="setDirty()"
    [maxlength]="maxLength"
  ></textarea>
  <mat-error *ngFor="let error of getErrors()">
    {{ error }}
  </mat-error>
  <mat-hint *ngIf="maxLength" align="end">{{ control.value?.length }}/{{ maxLength }}</mat-hint>
</mat-form-field>
